Member Function Documentation

bool RODOS::HAL_CAN::addIncomingFilter ( uint32_t  ID,
uint32_t  IDMask = 0,
bool  extID = true,
bool  rtr = false 
)

Add a filter for incoming Messages. Only Message with pass a filter are received. Filters may be implemented in hardware an can be limited. Also one ID should only match with one filter.

Parameters:
IDCAN ID (11bit for standard frame 29 bit for extended frame, always right justified)
IDmaskevery bit that is 1 here is don't care (11bit for standard frame 29 bit for extended frame, always right justified)
RTRframe?
Return values:
truewhen filter was created, false if not(no more hw rescources?)
int RODOS::HAL_CAN::config ( CAN_PARAMETER_TYPE  type,
int  paramVal 
)

uint32_t *  canID = 0,
bool *  isExtID = 0,
bool *  rtr = 0 
)

Receives CAN Message, non-blocking

Parameters:
recBufdataBuffer, must have space for 8 bytes
stdIDCAN ID of received frame (11bit for standard frame 29 bit for extended frame, always right justified)
rtrwas it a rtr frame?
Return values:
numberof databytes or -1 if nothing was received

Transmit CAN Message, non-blocking if there is space in outputbuffer

Parameters:
sendBufpointer to transmit dara
lenlenth of transmit data( max. 8 bytes)
stdIDCAN ID (11bit for standart frame 29 bit for extended frame, always right justified)
rtrsend RTR frame?
Return values:
-1on error 0 on success
